title: Introduction to Machine Learning
content: Machine learning is a subset of AI. It allows systems to learn from data and improve over time.

title: Deep Learning Techniques
content: Deep learning is a more advanced form of machine learning that uses neural networks to learn from large amounts of data.

title: Exploring Python for Data Science
content: Python is widely used in data science due to its simplicity and extensive library support.
